objectives: Students will discuss daily routines and habits using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Fantasy themed scenarios related to daily routines and habits
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining daily routines and habits content with Fantasy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore daily routines and habits through a Fantasy lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a magical or fantastical situation involving daily routines and habits

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to daily routines and habits in a fantasy context
Students engage in fantasy themed role-play about daily routines and habits using neutral register
Students create original fantasy themed content about daily routines and habits in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe daily routines and habits in a Fantasy scenario?
What magical or enchanted might be involved in daily routines and habits?
Can you create a Fantasy story about daily routines and habits?
How does daily routines and habits change when viewed through a Fantasy perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this fantasy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Fantasy situation involving daily routines and habits
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in fantasy context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within fantasy theme

topic_genre_blend: daily routines and habits with magical
daily routines and habits with enchanted
daily routines and habits with mystical

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Fantasy theme: Magic, mythical creatures, imaginary worlds

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Fantasy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
